ObjectStates.Name: Custom_Token
ObjectStates.LuaScript:
--Where it puts the cards it pulls. X, Y, Z
firstCardLocation = {0,2.6,0}
--Offset for those cards. 0 makes a stack stead of a row. 1 staggers, more spreads them more
cardShiftAmount = 0
--How many to deal
dealHowMany = 3

function onload()
    self.createButton({
        label="Uncommons", click_function="findDeck", function_owner=self,
        position={0,0.15,1.5}, height=240, width=1200, font_size=200
    })
end

--Finds the deck by comparing all spawned decks locations to the tool.
--Only a deck on the tool is close enough to trigger dealCards(v)
function findDeck()
    local allObjects = getAllObjects()
    local toolPos = self.getPosition()
    local toolPosX = toolPos.x
    local toolPosZ = toolPos.z
    for i, v in pairs(allObjects) do
        if v.tag == "Deck" then
            local vPos = v.getPosition()
            local vPosX = vPos.x
            local vPosZ = vPos.z
            local dX = toolPosX - vPosX
            local dZ = toolPosZ - vPosZ
            if dX<1 and dX>-1 and dZ<1 and dZ>-1 then
                dealCards(v)
            end
        end
    end
end

--Deals the cards using takeObject. Height shift is used to stagger their height
--so the top card stays on top of a new deck.
function dealCards(deck)
    math.randomseed(os.time())
    math.random()
    math.random()
    heightShift = 0
    for i=1, dealHowMany do
        posX = firstCardLocation[1] + cardShiftAmount * i-1
        posY = firstCardLocation[2] - heightShift
        posZ = firstCardLocation[3]
        local takenCard = deck.takeObject({
            position={posX, posY, posZ}, index=math.random(deck.getQuantity())        })
        heightShift = heightShift + 0.2
        takenCard.clone({
          position={posX, posY, posZ + 15}
        })
        takenCard.putObject(deck)
    end
end
